title: How to Make a Pipe from Things You Have at Home

steps.title: Use a hard fruit or vegetable, such as an apple or zucchini.
steps.content: Use a hard fruit or vegetable, such as an apple or zucchini. Apples tend to be a favorite because they're the right density and readily available. If you don't have a fresh apple sitting around the house, you can usually pick one up pretty cheap at a nearby convenience store. [1] X Research source Away from home? Many hotels have fresh fruit available for free in their lobbies, including apples. If you feel like getting creative, there are plenty of fruits and vegetables that can be converted into a pipe the same way—you might try butternut squash, cantaloupe, eggplant, or a pear. Choose a super fresh, juicy apple if you want to taste some of the sweetness of the apple as you smoke. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Carve a bowl in the top of the fruit.
steps.content: Carve a bowl in the top of the fruit. The size of this will depend on how much you want to try to pack into a single bowl, but you usually don't need it to be very big. Keep the size of your fruit in mind as well. You can use pretty much any sharp object to cut into the top if you need to hollow it out some more. If you're able to twist the stem of an apple all the way off, you might find that you don't need to cut into the top at all—the natural depression provides enough space for you to pack enough to smoke. If you're able to leave the skin on your fruit or vegetable, you can pack a bowl without needing aluminum foil. Otherwise, the juice of the fruit will dampen your stash and make it hard to light.

steps.title: Cut a hole from one side of the fruit to the other.
steps.content: Cut a hole from one side of the fruit to the other. A skewer, metal straw, or even a disposable ink pen (just take out the ink first) will work to poke a hole from one side of the apple to the other. Hollow objects such as pens or straws work best because they also capture the debris that's removed from the apple so you don't have to clean up behind yourself later to get a good, clean smoke. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Cut a hole from the top of the fruit down to the center.
steps.content: Cut a hole from the top of the fruit down to the center. Starting from the top, where you've carved out a spot for your bowl to be, cut another hole straight down until you meet up with the cross-channel you already created. At this point, you're almost done! [4] X Research source

steps.title: Blow through the hole to clear it out.
steps.content: Blow through the hole to clear it out. You shouldn't have any problem with the hole that goes from one side to the other because you would've pushed the debris all the way through. But there might still be some chunks left from the other channel down from the top. Make sure you can feel your breath coming through both the carb and the hole for the bowl. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Line the bowl with aluminum foil.
steps.content: Line the bowl with aluminum foil. If you didn't dig out the top of the fruit or vegetable you used so the peel is still mostly intact, this might not be necessary. If you do line the bowl, poke a hole in the aluminum foil at the bottom that matches the hole you made in your "pipe." [6] X Research source Make sure the fruit or vegetable you're using isn't coming into contact with the stuff you're smoking. If your smoking material gets wet, you'll have a hard time lighting it. You can also make a small mouthpiece with aluminum foil to fit into the mouth hole—just tear off a small piece and roll it into a skinny tube. It'll help catch some of the ash and debris when you smoke for a cleaner hit. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Pack your bowl and smoke it.
steps.content: Pack your bowl and smoke it. Take whatever you've got to smoke and fill the bowl you carved out in the top of your piece of fruit. To smoke, light your bowl while you inhale from the mouthpiece. Keep your thumb over the hole on the side to draw the smoke in, then release your thumb to clear the "chamber" inside the fruit. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Find a book with thin pages, such as a Bible.
steps.content: Find a book with thin pages, such as a Bible. Use the blank pages, usually found at the front and back of a book, first. If there aren't any of those, use pages with as little ink as possible just in case the ink is harmful. [9] X Research source A Bible is an easy choice if you happen to be traveling, since most hotel rooms have a free copy of the Bible in them. It doesn't have to be a book! Other types of thin paper work too—and some even work better. For example, if you have access to a cigarette, all you have to do is empty out the tobacco and use that. Thicker paper can work in a pinch, but generally speaking, you want your paper to be as thin as possible so that you're burning less paper and your cigarette burns smoothly and cleanly.

steps.title: Grind
steps.content: Grind the leaves that you want to smoke. Cigarettes are typically filled with very finely ground material so that they'll smoke cleanly and smoothly. If you don't have a grinder handy, try to break it up as small as you can with your fingers. [10] X Research source Make sure you de-stem, if necessary—stems can poke through the paper. Get rid of any seeds as well, which could pop when lit. This also gives you an idea of how much paper you'll need to roll this up so you can smoke it.

steps.title: Cut and fold the page into the desired size.
steps.content: Cut and fold the page into the desired size. If you want your paper to be about the same size as a standard rolling paper, make it about 2 in (5.1 cm) long and about 1.5 in (3.8 cm) wide. Changing the width of the paper affects how wide your resulting handmade cigarette will be. [11] X Research source Be careful not to make it too thick, or it might be difficult for the paper to hold up as you smoke it. You also want to be mindful of how much you have to fill it with.

steps.title: Fill your paper with fine-ground shake.
steps.content: Fill your paper with fine-ground shake. Tap the shake out into an even line down the length of your paper. Adjust it so that there's room to twist off both ends of the paper when you've rolled it. [12] X Research source Arrange it as evenly as possible. If there's a bulge, your cigarette won't smoke evenly.

steps.title: Roll the cigarette between your fingertips to shape it.
steps.content: Roll the cigarette between your fingertips to shape it. Roll the cigarette between your index fingers and your thumbs, with one hand holding each end of the cigarette. Roll the shake down until the front edge of your paper can only go around the shake once. Tuck the front edge in and then continue rolling until you have a tight, even cigarette shape. [13] X Research source Keep your fingertips in the ends so that your shake doesn't fall out while you're rolling and sealing the cigarette.

steps.title: Lick the top edge of the paper to seal the cigarette.
steps.content: Lick the top edge of the paper to seal the cigarette. Just very lightly tap the top edge of the paper to the tip of your tongue. Your saliva will act as a glue to seal the cigarette so that it holds together while you smoke it. [14] X Research source Be careful not to get the paper too wet, or your cigarette might smoke unevenly or even go out. When it's sealed, twist the ends to close the cigarette entirely so you don't have to hold your fingers in the ends anymore.

steps.title: Light one end and inhale from the other to smoke.
steps.content: Light one end and inhale from the other to smoke. Inhale slowly as you light the tip of the paper. Continue to inhale slowly to keep the cigarette from burning down unevenly or too quickly. Keep in mind that unlike other types of pipes, a cigarette will typically stay lit and continue burning, even if you're not hitting it. [15] X Research source

steps.title: Find a pen that has a metal tip.
steps.content: Find a pen that has a metal tip. Pens that are made completely from plastic will melt from the heat if you attempt to smoke from them. The metal tip gives you a heat-resistant surface for your bowl so you can turn the pen into a pipe . [16] X Research source

steps.title: Take the pen apart and get everything out of it.
steps.content: Take the pen apart and get everything out of it. Unscrew the tip and remove the cap on the end of the pen. Get the ink chamber and spring, which you can go ahead and throw away if you don't plan on using the pen again. [17] X Research source If the pen doesn't have an end that pops off, you might have to find something to cut the end of the pen off. You need the end to be completely open.

steps.title: Place the metal tip back in the pen backwards.
steps.content: Place the metal tip back in the pen backwards. Put the narrow end of the metal tip into one end of the barrel of the pen. Push it in as far as possible to create a seal between the pen barrel and the metal tip. [18] X Research source Because of the way the pen is made, the tip might not stay securely. If you want a tighter seal, use a lighter to melt the plastic at the end of the barrel slightly so it will conform to the size of the tip.

steps.title: Use the metal pin tip as a bowl.
steps.content: Use the metal pin tip as a bowl. Fill the bowl with whatever you've got to smoke. Keep in mind this is typically only enough for one or two hits. Tap it in carefully so you don't break the seal between the pen barrel and the tip. [19] X Research source You typically don't want a super fine grind with this kind of pipe or you might suck it through the opening when you smoke it.

steps.title: Inhale through the other end of the pen to smoke.
steps.content: Inhale through the other end of the pen to smoke. At this point, the pen smokes just like any pipe. Put your mouth around the other end of the pen and inhale as you light the bowl. Keep in mind that depending on the seal and how tight you packed your bowl, you might have to hold the pen practically vertical to keep everything where it's supposed to be. [20] X Research source

steps.title: Clean out an empty plastic bottle.
steps.content: Clean out an empty plastic bottle. Any bottle will work for this, including old water bottles or soda bottles. Generally, a smaller bottle will be easier for you to hit—it takes a lot of lung capacity to clear the chamber of a larger bottle. Rinse out the bottle thoroughly and toss the cap (you won't need it). [21] X Research source Smoking out of plastic can be hazardous to your health. Only use this as a last resort if you're in a pinch and have no other options.

steps.title: Poke a hole into the side of the bottle.
steps.content: Poke a hole into the side of the bottle. You can use a skewer, a cooking thermometer, even a knife—whatever you have handy that can poke through the plastic. This hole is where you'll stick your bowl, so it needs to be a little wide. [22] X Research source You can use the barrel of an empty pen to mount your bowl to the bottle. Then, the barrel would go through this hole straight into the bottle.

steps.title: Use aluminum foil to create a bowl.
steps.content: Use aluminum foil to create a bowl. Take a smaller sheet of aluminum foil and start folding it around until it starts to resemble a small bowl. Leave a little bit of a funnel of aluminum foil in the center of the bowl so you can stick it down into the bottle. Use a sewing needle or similar object to poke at least one tiny hole in the bottom of your bowl so you can inhale the smoke. [23] X Research source While this can be handy in a pinch, limit smoking in aluminum foil because it can add dangerous chemicals to the smoke that you inhale.

steps.title: Pack your bowl and stick it in the hole in the bottle.
steps.content: Pack your bowl and stick it in the hole in the bottle. Pack this pretty tightly with whatever you have to smoke, then gently insert it into the hole you made. If you're using a pen barrel, stick it into the pen barrel instead. [24] X Research source If you want to make a bong instead of a dry pipe, you might also fill the bottle about a quarter of the way full of water.

steps.title: Light it up and smoke out of the mouth of the bottle.
steps.content: Light it up and smoke out of the mouth of the bottle. Turn the bottle so that the bowl is facing upward and put your mouth on the lip of the bottle. Light the bowl and inhale slowly to pull the smoke into the chamber. [25] X Research source You can remove the bowl when you're done filling the chamber if you want, then inhale the smoke directly from the chamber.

steps.title: Get a dry cardboard tube in good condition.
steps.content: Get a dry cardboard tube in good condition. It can be long or short, thick or thin. A paper towel roll will give you bigger hits, while an empty toilet paper roll is smaller and a little easier to manage. [26] X Research source If the cardboard is wet or broken, it might not work properly. Make sure it's solid all the way around.

steps.title: Cover one end of the tube to block air.
steps.content: Cover one end of the tube to block air. To make the pipe easier to smoke, you can wrap something over the end you're not going to smoke out of. Air will still get through, but not as much. Paper, plastic wrap, or even aluminum will work. You might also need a rubber band to secure the cover over the end. [27] X Research source Depending on how long the tube is, you might want to stuff some toilet paper in the bottom to take up some space and make your pipe easier to hit. [28] X Research source You can also simply cover the end with one hand and hold the pipe that way while you light it with the other hand. [29] X Research source

steps.title: Cut a space in your tube where your bowl will sit.
steps.content: Cut a space in your tube where your bowl will sit. Use a knife, scissors, or another sharp object to poke a hole a little ways down from the end of the tube that you plan on smoking out of. Depending on how you want your bowl to sit, you might want to make this hole a little bit bigger. [30] X Research source If you want your bowl to sit up on the surface of the tube, this can be a relatively small hole. Make a larger hole if you're planning on packing the bowl inside the tube.

steps.title: Mold a bowl with aluminum foil.
steps.content: Mold a bowl with aluminum foil. Take a piece of aluminum foil and tear it down into a smaller piece that you can fit over the hole you're going to put in the cardboard. You might want to twist or fold it around so that it actually looks like a round bowl that sits above the surface of the cardboard. You can also simply use the aluminum foil to cover the hole with a small depression of foil in the hole where your bowl will sit. [31] X Research source If you have a pen that has a metal tip, use the tip instead to create a safer and neater looking bowl (although it probably won't hold as much). [32] X Research source

steps.title: Poke a hole in the bottom of your bowl.
steps.content: Poke a hole in the bottom of your bowl. Use something sharp, such as a needle or a cooking thermometer, to poke a hole or two in the aluminum foil. This allows the smoke to travel through so you can inhale it. [33] X Research source Be careful not to have holes that are too large or too close together or the bowl will collapse when you pack it and try to smoke it.

steps.title: Pack your bowl and light it.
steps.content: Pack your bowl and light it. Gently fill the bowl and place your mouth over the open end of the tube, then light the bowl. Inhale slowly to pull the smoke through the tube and into your lungs. [34] X Research source If you have a bowl that sits up on top of the tube, you can pull it out when you've taken enough of a hit so that you can inhale the smoke that's collected in the tube.
